description: Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services...
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Request for Supply Arrangement

**Tender Title:**
Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Tender Reference:**
[cb-258-80499256][]

**Publication Date:**
June 19, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:**
June 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice Type:**
Request for Supply Arrangement - Competitive

**Tender Category:**
SRV - Services

**Summary:**
The Department of National Defense is seeking a contractor to provide Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). The contractor will be required to provide computer application support.

**Description:**
The service requirement is for the Department of National Defense and is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: Stream 5 – Computer Services Categories – 5.1 Computer Application Support.

**Eligible Contractors:**
The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 4165047 Canada Inc.
* 9345540 CANADA INC
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
* Bits In Glass Inc.
* BRYCA Solutions Inc.
* MARKETBRIDGE TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Messa Computing Inc.
* NATTIQ Inc, Vision XRM Inc. XRM Vision Inc in Joint Venture
* PureLogic IT Solutions Inc
* Spirit Personnel Inc.
* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
* Tech4soft Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

**Level of Security:**
Top Secret

**Document:**
The full document, including the Request for Proposal, can be found at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40164/s5008519-method-2---rfp.pdf][]

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca. 

I hope the rewritten text meets your requirements! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
